title: How can i guranatee a position in Normals
body: My account is OCE and I hate playing ranked, in Normals its the first one who calls that gets the position, and it really pisses me off when im left with Bot Lane. There is no way to guranatee a position, and i really hate that. I always lag into the lobby, when i want to play mid i get stuck with support or adc which I hate. How can i guranatee a position or will riot be adding something in season 6

replies.body: Queue up with 4 friends who know where you want to play

Fortunately enough, Riot *are* adding something in season 6. It's basically a combination of Draft pick and Teambuilder. You pick your two most preferred positions (or fill), then you get matched with players based on that and can even show an "intended champion pick", if you so choose.
Thank the lord they are adding that
It's also going to replace normal draft pick queues, replacing the normal blind pick queue for OCE (if I remember correctly).
I don't think it should replace the blind pick but i also believe OCE is not big enough for the 2 ques to go separate.
u know its a lie that there are set positions in moba. theres no such thing as calls or lanes. its a map.
